alert.note: Alert for Cass (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 12:28AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cass County through 115 AM CDT... At 1227 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Walnut, or 8 miles west of Atlantic, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. Locations impacted include... Atlantic and Marne. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 50 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southwestern and west central Iowa.
